apps.create_app: jobs -r create_app -F <path to app json config file>
apps.run_app: jobs <app_id> -r run_app -F <path to json job config file> -n <name to assign job> -v <app_version>
apps.download_app_results: jobs <jobs_uuid> -r download_app_results -of <path to local output file>

pods.get_pods: get list of pods available to selected account
pods.delete_pod:
delete the pod. Requires user confirmation
Format: delete_pod <pod_id>
pods.set_pod_perms:
sets the permissions on a pod
Format: set_pod_perms <pod_id> -u <username to give perms> -L <permission level>
pods.delete_pod_perms:
deletes the permissions for the selected user
Format: delete_pod_perms <pod_id> -u <user to take perms from>
pods.get_perms:
gets a list of permissions for a pod
Format: get_perms <pod_id>

systems.create_system: systems -r create_system -F <path to system json config file>
systems.set_credentials: systems <system_id> -r set_credentials -pvk <path to private key> -pbk <path to public key>

files.list_files: files <system_id> -r list_files -F <folder path in remote tapis system>
files.download: files <system_id> -r download -sf <path to remote file on tapis system to download from> -df <path to local file to download into>
files.upload: files <system_id> -r upload -sf <path of local file to upload> -df <remote destination filename on tapis system>
